pr_title: RM26500 : Fix machine not set to null for a human type work center

timeline.bodyText: Please follow naming convention for action by adding action type: action-<object-name>-<action-type>-<context>
timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -101,7 +101,10 @@
 		     <field name="costSheetGroup" expr="eval: __config__?.app.isApp('production') ? __config__?.app.getApp('production')?.workCenterCostSheetGroup : null " if="__config__.app.getApp('production')?.getManageCostSheetGroup()"/>
 		     <field name="product" expr="eval: __config__?.app.isApp('production') ? __config__?.app.getApp('production')?.workCenterProduct : null" />
     </action-record>
-    
+
+	<action-record name="action-work-center-type-select-onchange" model="com.axelor.apps.production.db.WorkCenter">
